data.name: Break the encryption
data.description:
## Task

You are trying to create a function to decrypt an encrypted message.
You have found out that the encryption is weak and simply rearranges
the bits in the message.

### Quick Start

You are to write a function `decrypt(bitsString)` taking a string of 0s and 1s
representing bits in an encrypted message and returning a string of 0s and 1s
with the bits in their original position.

You have access to an `encrypt(bitsString)` function that will encrypt a
message of your choosing.

### Input

A string of 0s and 1s represending an encrypted message

### Output

Return a string of 0s and 1s represending the decrypted message
